name: Space Adventure (itch) (juanyfanga)
description:
This is my third game made for "The Most Comprehensive Guide To Unity Game Development" which is a Udemy Course.

CONTROLS:

WASD: To move.

J: To shoot.

K: To shoot a powerful blaster.

L: To shoot a powerful blaster.

I: To shoot a powerful missile.

O: To shoot a powerful missile.

Have fun and survive the most waves that you can!
